name: The Master's Treasure
description:
Explore the mines to gather ore and gems or find hidden treasures.
You will need to find items to help you bypass opposing miners, creatures, and other obstacles along the way.
If you bring the master enough treasure, you may just live to see another day.

Created for the 4th Quarter Annual Drifty Jam.

Game by Zyphli
Created with RPG Maker MZ.
Graphics by PV Games, Rexard, and PandaMaru.
Plugins by Visustella, Galv
Music by Scythuz
Sounds by Audio Alchemist, Daydream Sound
